00017 //! \addtogroup fn_stddev

00020 
00021 
00022 template<typename T1>
00023 inline
00024 Mat<typename T1::pod_type>
00025 stddev(const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& X, const u32 norm_type = 0, const u32 dim = 0)
00026   {
00027   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00028   
00029   typedef typename T1::elem_type  in_eT;
00030   typedef typename T1::pod_type  out_eT;
00031 
00032   const unwrap<T1>      tmp(X.get_ref());
00033   const Mat<in_eT>& A = tmp.M;
00034   
00035   Mat<out_eT> out;
00036   
00037   op_stddev::apply(out, A, norm_type, dim);
00038   
00039   return out;
00040   }
00041 
00042 
00043 
00044 //! Immediate 'find the standard deviation of a row vector' operation
00045 template<typename eT>
00046 inline
00047 typename get_pod_type<eT>::result
00048 stddev(const Row<eT>& A, const u32 norm_type = 0)
00049   {
00050   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00051   
00052   arma_debug_check( (A.n_elem == 0), "stddev(): given vector has no elements" );
00053   
00054   return std::sqrt( op_var::direct_var(A.mem, A.n_elem, norm_type) );
00055   }
00056 
00057 
00058 
00059 //! Immediate 'find the standard deviation of a column vector' operation
00060 template<typename eT>
00061 inline
00062 typename get_pod_type<eT>::result
00063 stddev(const Col<eT>& A, const u32 norm_type = 0)
00064   {
00065   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00066   
00067   arma_debug_check( (A.n_elem == 0), "stddev(): given vector has no elements" );
00068   
00069   return std::sqrt( op_var::direct_var(A.mem, A.n_elem, norm_type) );
00070   }

00074 //! find the standard deviation of a subview_row
00075 template<typename eT>
00076 inline
00077 typename get_pod_type<eT>::result
00078 stddev(const subview_row<eT>& A, const u32 norm_type = 0)
00079   {
00080   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00081   
00082   arma_debug_check( (A.n_elem == 0), "stddev(): given vector has no elements" );
00083   
00084   return std::sqrt( op_var::direct_var(A, norm_type) );
